name: Rootie & Twootie: Operation Chaos and the Rogue Numbers 3
name_original: Rootie & Twootie: Operation Chaos and the Rogue Numbers 3
description:
Description:

Rootie and Twootie get up to even more shenanigans! When the evil Math Magician kidnaps our two protagonists for his nefarious deeds, help our ragtag duo escape, free the numbers and maybe even come up with their best nerdy puns along the way. 

An educational experience with a side of silly fun, Rootie and Twootie:  Operation Chaos and The Rogue Numbers 3 was made for the GGJ 2023 with the theme "Roots".

Controls:

A - Join level/Continue dialogue

Start - Start level

Left Stick Button - Move character

Right Stick Button - Aim ability 

RT (Right Trigger) - Perform ability

Credits:

Art - Kit

Programming - Fábio Sousa , Ricardo Subtil , Miguel Belbute

Music - Ricardo Subtil

We are part of Game Dev Técnico, a university association focused on developing impactful games through jams and internal projects. If you're interested in playing more games from us be sure to follow GDT at their itch.io - gamedevtecnico.itch.io
